gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 108, Wizards 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Blazers defeated the Wizards, 108-102. Portland had great performances from De'Andre Ayton (34 points, 13 rebounds) and Dalano Banton (21 points, eight rebounds, eight assists) while Scoot Henderson added 19 points and seven assists. Deni Avdija (22 points, 12 rebounds) and Jordan Poole (20 points, nine assists, five rebounds) led Washington in the loss. The Blazers move to 21-56 while the Wizards fall to 15-63.
